sources.title: Secret Agent X-9 (1945) LLOYD BRIDGESüçï13-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 13-Chapter Cliffhanger
Starring: Lloyd Bridges, Keye Luke, Jan Wiley
Directed by: Ray Taylor, Lewis D. Collins

At the onset of WWII, on Shadow Island‚ÄîAsia's neutral crossroads of intrigue‚ÄîSecret Agent X-9 teams with Chinese and Australian agents to stop the Axis Powers from possessing a formula to create a synthetic fuel code-named "7-22."
TRIVIA: Secret Agent X-9 began as a comic strip syndicated in newspapers by King Features in 1934. It was created by hard-boiled detective writer Dashiell Hammett and artist Alex Raymond, the hand behind Jungle Jim and Flash Gordon. Universal Pictures adapted it for a cliffhanger in 1937 and again in 1945.

39:50     CHAPTER 3: Death Curve
58:56     CHAPTER 4: Floodlight Murder
1:17:55  CHAPTER 5: Doom Downgrade
1:34:16  CHAPTER 6: Strafed by a Zero
1:51:00  CHAPTER 7: High-Pressure Deadline
2:10:15  CHAPTER 8: The Dropping Floor
2:27:59  CHAPTER 9: The Danger Point
2:42:31  CHAPTER 10: Japanese Burial
3:01:31  CHAPTER 11: Fireworks for Deadmen
3:18:51  CHAPTER 12: Big Gun Fusillade
3:36:13  CHAPTER 13: Zero Minute
3:53:37 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: American, Chinese and Australian agents join forces to stop the Nazis from obtaining the formula for synthetic fuel.
metadata.Writer: Joseph O'Donnell, Harold Channing Wire, Patricia Harper
metadata.Actors: Lloyd Bridges, Keye Luke, Jan Wiley
